person.persName: Charles Nicholas Davis (Carter County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier.)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Moses H. Davis and Mildred F. Davis. Resident of Lewis County in 1850. Farm hand in Carter County in 1860. Served in the 40th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private from September 28, 1863 to December 30, 1864.
